alert.note: Alert for Itawamba; Lee; Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 5:49PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Itawamba, southeastern Lee and northwestern Monroe Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 549 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Amory. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amory, New Wren, Nettleton, Wren and Bigbee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
